document_data.name: Sar
document_data.mainbody: '''Sar''', also called '''Vengeance''', was a giant two-headed [[roc]] who was stabled at [[Sarahin]], the great fortress of the [[Everlasting]].{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|24}}
document_data.Activites:
Sar was used by the [[holy slayer]]s on major raids against caravans travelling either between [[Halwa]] and the coast, or between [[Qudra]] and the south.

The sheer size and appearance of the giant bird usually caused caravan guards to flee for their lives. Sar was fed a diet of camels and enemies slain during raids.
